originalText.text: Dr. Mohen is amazing!  My first visit was very long and thorough account of my medical history.  Since then, she has continued to be extremely  thorough.  She also is kind and easy to work with.  She is always on time with her appointments, pleasant, and also willing to think outside the box when it comes to figuring things out.  I would highly recommend her.  I feel so fortunate to have found her!

text.text: Dr. Mohen is amazing!  My first visit was very long and thorough account of my medical history.  Since then, she has continued to be extremely  thorough.  She also is kind and easy to work with.  She is always on time with her appointments, pleasant, and also willing to think outside the box when it comes to figuring things out.  I would highly recommend her.  I feel so fortunate to have found her!

originalText.text: Canceled my MRI appointments twice because of the office didn’t send authorization on time (and still hasn’t). Not only are they not reachable during office hours or after, the text message also rarely responds and just sent an EOD (unavailable) message to reply to any message received during the day. More importantly the answering service has a horrible manner at 7:15pm on 1/30. He hung up on me when requested him to deliver message. When I called for the second and third and nth time, I was cut off of the line right away without even being picked up, or picked up and hung up when hearing my voice. I hope they recorded such behavior.

originalText.text: Dr. Mohen is the best neurologist out there!  I used to suffer from vestibular migraines, but I don't anymore!  Dr. Mohen laid out several treatment options for me and was very receptive to how I felt about them.  She is incredibly friendly and if you have any questions/concerns, she is very easy to contact.  I would highly recommend her in a heartbeat!

text.text: Dr. Mohen is the best neurologist out there!  I used to suffer from vestibular migraines, but I don't anymore!  Dr. Mohen laid out several treatment options for me and was very receptive to how I felt about them.  She is incredibly friendly and if you have any questions/concerns, she is very easy to contact.  I would highly recommend her in a heartbeat!

originalText.text: I love Dr. Mohen! She is so sweet, caring, and funny. Her bedside manner is wonderful! Dr. Mohen explains test results in great detail and order the necessary test needed. I love the fact she is not judgemental or condescending and respect my wishes to not take meds if not needed. I wish most my doctors were like her.

text.text: I love Dr. Mohen! She is so sweet, caring, and funny. Her bedside manner is wonderful! Dr. Mohen explains test results in great detail and order the necessary test needed. I love the fact she is not judgemental or condescending and respect my wishes to not take meds if not needed. I wish most my doctors were like her.

originalText.text: Dr. Mohen is kind and attentive. She listened to my issues very carefully and contacted me personally a few times to discuss test results. I strongly recommend her.
